description: A collection of scripts that can be used to detect vulnerabilities.

scripts.name: pointer-to-int.sc
scripts.description: Lists all occurrences of pointer arithmetic that are subsequently assigned to an int.

scripts.name: malloc-overflow.sc
scripts.description: Lists all call sites where the first argument to malloc involves multiplication or addition

scripts.name: syscalls.sc
scripts.description: Lists all C Linux syscalls found in the program
